document.full_text: after a week of debating the future of nuclear power, e.u. leaders on friday decided that reactors across all member nations should undergo safety tests in response to radiation leaks in japan.
document.title: europe to test safety of nuclear reactors
lines_and_colors: after a week of debating the future of nuclear power, e.u. leaders on friday decided that reactors across all member nations should undergo safety tests in response to radiation leaks in japan.
